body_html:
For example, in my installation it's this folder:
~/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/tensorboard/

Inside of it is the source for tensorboard (tensorboard.py) and other folders with more source (like the backend). This test is just a sort of sanity check, to see if you're running the exact same tensorboard code of your colleagues.
body_text:
For example, in my installation it's this folder:
~/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/tensorboard/
Inside of it is the source for tensorboard (tensorboard.py) and other folders with more source (like the backend). This test is just a sort of sanity check, to see if you're running the exact same tensorboard code of your colleagues.
body:
For example, in my installation it's this folder:
`~/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/tensorboard/`

Inside of it is the source for tensorboard (tensorboard.py) and other folders with more source (like the backend). This test is just a sort of sanity check, to see if you're running the exact same tensorboard code of your colleagues.
